name: Drayview
description:
DRAYVIEW

STORY

it's the story of a couple who change their lives and move but not everything goes very well and a tragedy happens. ghost and investigation, discover the story that happens to them.

LANGUAGE 

The game is in French but with your support, I add new EN language.

DEMO

I am the only one to develop this game. I posted the demo. That way you can test it. With your feedback it gives me strength to continue. Ha yes, the game is in French. If I have enough support I could add the language EN
